Journal.Title: Zhongguo yi xue ke xue yuan xue bao. Acta Academiae Medicinae Sinicae
Journal.ISOAbbreviation: Zhongguo Yi Xue Ke Xue Yuan Xue Bao

Article.ArticleTitle: [Analysis of contents of berberine in Coptis chinensis of Lichuan].

AbstractText: To determine the contents of berberine in Coptis chinensis of Lichuan and establish its best cultivation scheme.
We used high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) to measure the contents of berberine at different altitude, growth age, and leaves.

Analytic data showed that the growth age and firry woods shading did not affect the contents of berberine in rhizome of Coptis chinensis. Low altitude was more suitable for Coptis chinensis to synthesize berberine. The contents of berberine in rhizome of Coptis chinensis with floral leaf were higher than those with lusterless and lustrous leaves, but no significant difference.

The synthesis of berberine is closely correlated with shading conditions. It is recommended that the shading ratio should be reduced or the sheds removed in the middle growth age (2-3 years), and then the herb should be reshaped at the last year to enhance the synthesis of berberine, so as to obtain high-quality Coptis chinensis in the harvest.
